title: Madison County
cleaned_text: Madison County The Madison County Health Department offers WIC, environmental, home care, and clinical services to the public. Clinical services include STD testing and treatment, family planning, childhood and other vaccines, and breast and cervical cancer screening. Certified copies of birth, death, marriage, and divorce certificates may be obtained from this health department. Call us at (256) 539-3711. For operating hours, contact information, and directions to the Madison County Health Department, visit [Contact Us](contact.html). Follow [Madison County Health Department](https://www.facebook.com/MadisonCountyHealth) on Facebook. otro Madison](https://www.facebook.com/MadisonCountyHealth) en Facebook. Operating Hours 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Free Communication Assistance The Alabama Department of Public Health offers free communication assistance to all clients. Free communication assistance is the use of an interpreter or other communication services to assist the participant in effectively communicating with bilingual staff. [Learn more](../about/assistance.html). COVID-19 Vaccine and Testing - COVID-19 vaccinations are given Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. Testing is performed as needed. No appointment is needed. Please call 256-539-3711 ahead of time to ensure there is a nurse available. - Other providers around the state are vaccinating at this time. You can view a list of other providers using the All Vaccine Providers tab on our [Vaccine Clinic Dashboard](https://arcg.is/1vLSOX)or [COVID-19 Table](https://dph1.adph.state.al.us/covid-19/). Annual Report The Madison County Health Department provided over 7,900 home care visits in 2022. For details on this and other public health accomplishments and initiatives, see the [2022 Madison County Health Department Annual Report](assets/madison_annualreport.pdf). Customer Satisfaction Survey The Alabama Department of Public Health is asking patients of our county health departments to complete a customer satisfaction survey. ADPH cares about what you think of the services we provide. We value your feedback and look forward to receiving your ratings and comments. Page last updated: July 18, 2023
